card_text: You can activate 1 of the following effects;$N●Send 1 Plant monster from your hand or face-up field to the GY; gain 500 LP.$N●Target 1 Plant monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then gain 500 LP.$N●Pay 1000 LP; Special Summon 1 "Aroma" monster from your GY.$NYou can only use this effect of "Blessed Winds" once per turn.
